title: Crazy in Love
description: Golf resort heiress Birdie Sederburg's life revolves around how visible she is on the latest celebrity watch blog. That is, until she bumps into hot new actor Dean Stevenson - after weeks of stalking. Dean's agent persuades him that being seen with Birdie is good for his profile, and the next step is engagement - or so Birdie thinks.
author: Chris Manby
